name: Pastor C. Sibanda
bio: Guides the church in spiritual growth, preaching, and community outreach with a heart for discipleship.

name: Nkosana Mapuma
bio: Provides steady oversight across financial, administrative, and civic ministries. Through Treasury, Clerical, and Religious Liberty, he ensures that the church operates with integrity, transparency, and spiritual conviction — safeguarding both our resources and our right to worship freely.

name: Nkululeko Mnkandla
bio: Nurtures both prophetic insight and lifelong learning. Through Education, Voice of Prophecy, and the Spirit of Prophecy ministries, he guides the church in truth, teaching, and spiritual depth — ensuring that biblical understanding is preserved, proclaimed, and lived.

name: Nqobile Zikhali
bio: Uplifts and mobilizes women and families through service and spiritual growth. Her leadership in Women’s Ministries, Dorcus, and AMO reflects a nurturing strength that empowers others to serve with grace, dignity, and conviction.

name: Thulani Ngwenya
bio: Strengthens the church’s voice and spiritual education. Through Sabbath School and Communication, he fosters learning, dialogue, and digital outreach that connects hearts, deepens understanding, and builds community.

name: Roy Sikhosana
bio: Fosters harmony in both home and worship. Through Family Life and Music, he cultivates environments where relationships deepen and praise rises — guiding the church in both intimacy and reverence.

name: Richard Maplanka
bio: Leads with vision and stewardship, guiding Church Development and resource management. His leadership in Stewardship reflects a commitment to building spaces — both physical and spiritual — where faith can flourish and ministry can thrive.

name: Simba Machoko
bio: Serves with quiet strength, supporting both the physical and spiritual needs of the church. Through Deacons and Prison Ministries, he extends care to the congregation and brings hope to those behind bars — embodying Christ’s compassion in action.

name: Doubt  Makunike
bio: Champions outreach and truth-sharing. Through Personal Ministries and Publishing, he equips members to share the gospel boldly and ensures that literature and learning remain central to our mission of reaching hearts and homes.

name: Sibongumusa Dhlodhlo
bio: Nurtures the next generation and coordinates spiritual gatherings that renew the soul. His leadership in Children’s Ministries, Youth Ministries, and Camp Meeting ensures that every age group is embraced, empowered, and spiritually fed.

name: Omega G. Ncube
bio: leads with compassion and inclusivity. Through Health Ministries, Possibilities Ministries, and PAKIA, he promotes holistic well-being and ensures that every member — regardless of ability or background — finds belonging, strength, and purpose.

name: Sukoluhle Sibanda
bio: Focuses on community outreach and member care, ensuring the church remains a beacon of hope.

name: Tymate Ndlovu
bio: Assists in church operations and supports members through practical service and care.

name: Philani Sibanda
bio: Plays a key role in church hospitality and member support, enhancing the fellowship experience.

name: Ralph Makuyana
bio: Dedicated to serving the church community with kindness, ensuring a welcoming environment for all.

name: Dumisani Khanye
bio: Committed to supporting church activities and assisting members in their spiritual journey.

name: Ntando Moyo
bio: Works diligently to uphold the values of the church, promoting spiritual growth and community service.

name: Gareth Foya
bio: Leads with integrity and a servant's heart, fostering a supportive and loving church environment.

name: Wandile Khuphe
bio: Committed to the spiritual well-being of the congregation, providing guidance and support.
